name: corba.js
description: Object Request Broker (ORB) and Interface Definition Language (IDL) compiler
author: Mark-Andr√© Hopf <mhopf@mark13.org>

scripts.build: npm run build:idl:build && npm run build:idl:compile && npm run build:src:compile
scripts.build:idl:compile: npm run build:idl:compile:test && npm run build:idl:compile:test-mico
scripts.test: npm run test:mico:ior && npm run test:run
scripts.test:watch: karma start --singleRun=false --autoWatch=true karma.conf.cjs | grep -v '^Chrome Headless .* LOG:'
scripts.test:mico: npm run test:mico:ior && npm run test:mico:run:watch
scripts.test:mico:watch: ttsc --watch & sleep 2; node --enable-source-maps node_modules/.bin/nodemon -q -w lib/test-mico ./node_modules/.bin/mocha lib/test-mico
scripts.test:demux:run: npm run build:idl:build && bin/corba-idl --ts-all test-mico/demux.idl && ttsc --watch & node --enable-source-maps node_modules/.bin/nodemon -q -w lib ./node_modules/.bin/mocha lib/test-mico/demux.spec.js
